list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
GAME CREATION STARTS HERE
add first dummy enemy add first items fix issue: when enemy healed, player animation played as well

task.summary: Default task
add ability explainer fix issue when explainer goes out of screen fix effect numbers, when effect should not have number fix canActivate if promote
add combo effect add combo counter add combo detector fixed TODO about non-rectangular detection for the players abilities
fix one of the TODO about paralyzed promoted fields had wrong color fix wrong paragraph of stun explainer

add armor GUI add armor skill, effect, paragraph add kongregate support (no longer allows scrolling) fix minor issue of regen skill in case if its secondary
TODO: animation for armor break start of you turn armor break
add penetrate dmg GUI add penetrate dmg effect add enemy can draing and regen mana from now
add armor for enemy add penetrate dmg skill for player
refaktor armor dmg add growing chance number for Rage fix armor dmg issue
add multiple skill usage for enemy add jquery-ui fix pattern size in rank view
add inventory basics add inventory drag and drop fix 0 division at updateMp, updateEnemyMp functions, if max_mp = 0
fix/refactor enemy chance updates graphics. From now it only updates after second effect activation. add SkillGraphics class, so skill can be created in battle phase and in inventory.
add skill rank appearance in inventory TODO: skill rank should be clickable
add skill rank appearance in inventory TODO: skill rank should be clickable
fix skill rank appearance in inventory
add rank explainer to SkillGraphics()
add skill_engine.js, from now skill come from the items
add item dragging from bag to character and character to bag
add skill changing when item is in use add line when items is in use add character portrait fix element placements
add mana cost as skill effect
add stuck chance type fix minor issues about player skills graphics
add cursor to inventory add skill explainer in inventory fix penetrate in rank explainer fix line z-index
add DEVELOP chance add paragraphs for STUCK chance
add WEAKNESS chance
fix font preloader
add skill reset
add winning battle fix issues with events handling in inventory
fix ability explainer removing logs
change ceil to round add new enemies on win
add background for items in inventory
fix character to bag item change
add destroy item in inventory
delete destroy item panel if we leave inventory
change inventory button to back fix some minor issues about it

GAME CREATION STARTS HERE
add first dummy enemy add first items fix issue: when enemy healed, player animation played as well
